text: @latimes @MLB @MLB_PLAYERS #RobManfred have shown themselves to be nothing but greedy grifters who want to put their players&minwage hotel& dining workers who come into contact w/them at risk of #COVID19. They also want to take away millions of tests from public who can’t still get tested
